channel.title: creators on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in creators on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-09
item.description: Reddit to roll out personalized end-of-year recaps with stats about users’ habits (3 minute read) Reddit is rolling out a recap feature for all users that will include a summary of time spent on the platform, among other statistics.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-08
item.description: Apple CEO Tim Cook engineered a secret $275 billion deal with China (3 minute read) A recently published report details Apple CEO Tim Cook’s efforts to establish strong relationships between Apple and the Chinese government.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-12
item.description: Spotify is acquiring an audiobook company (3 minute read) Spotify has announced plans to acquire Findaway for an undisclosed price.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-04
item.description: Facebook skirts Apple’s App Store fees with custom subscription links for creators (3 minute read) Facebook creators will soon be able to share custom web links to direct their fans to pay for subscriptions using Facebook’s native payments system.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-29
item.description: SpaceX is almost ready to start turning Starship’s launch tower into ‘Mechazilla’ (3 minute read) SpaceX plans to use a giant tower with arms to catch its rockets.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-18
item.description: Amazon is in talks to buy MGM for $9 billion (2 minute read) Amazon has reportedly offered $9 billion to purchase MGM, the film giant that owns a historic catalog of films, an array of production and distribution companies, and the content network Epix.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-21
item.description: Amazon offers to help U.S. with vaccine in letter to President Biden (1 minute read) Amazon has offered to help with the US efforts involving the COVID-19 vaccine in a letter addressed to President Joe Biden.
